issue.title: [Rust] CSV reader should return Result<Option<>> not Option<Result<>>
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3895](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3895). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
CSV reader should return Result<Option<>> not Option<Result<>>

comments.body:
